episodes.title: Man Dies After Appearing On The Jeremy Kyle Show | Death On Daytime | Channel 4 Documentaries
episodes.description:
Strong language from the start, references to suicide and content some people may find upsetting.

In 2019, Steve Dymond took his life after appearing on daytime TV's biggest show. Guests, loved ones and whistleblowers reveal the scandal behind the hit series.

EP 1 of 2: The shocking inside story of how The Jeremy Kyle Show, king of daytime TV, ended up cancelled and disgraced following the death of a participant.

First shown: 13 March 2022

00:00 Never-before-seen footage
02:17 Steve Dymond, death of participant
06:57 Mother and daughter case
13:50 Insiders speak out
15:32 The case of Steve Dymond
23:33 Cameraman speaks out
36:35 Investigating the death

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1
 
About #4Docs:
Welcome to Channel 4 Documentaries, the home of cutting-edge factual content, from the award-winning 24 Hours In Police Custody and Dispatches to provocative and powerful original true stories.

From shocking crimes to ground-breaking investigations, follow detectives unravelling real-life murder cases, step into the shadows of hidden subcultures and witness the shocking realities of romance fraud.

Subscribe now and bring yourself closer to the stories shaping our world.

episodes.title: Marilyn Manson: Inside The Abuse Allegations | Manson Unmasked | Channel 4 Documentaries
episodes.description:
With strong language, references to suicide and sexual abuse, and scenes that some viewers might find offensive.

In 2021, Marilyn Manson was accused of sexual assault. This deep dig into the allegations examines the wider context of the rock singer's meteoric rise and his dramatic fall. As more women accuse Manson of misconduct, the court cases stack up. The rock star's allies cry conspiracy. But others ask how much did the music industry know, and when? (EP3 of 3)

First shown: 14 Jan 2025

Watch episodes 1 and 2 here: https://www.channel4.com/programmes/marilyn-manson-unmasked

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1

Welcome to Channel 4 Documentaries; the home of cutting-edge factual content, from the award-winning 24 Hours in A&E and Police Custody to provocative and powerful original true stories. episodes.title: The Dark Side of Modelling: Uncovered - Paid To Party | In Too Deep
episodes.description:
Vulnerable young women are taking ‘modelling’ jobs which are sometimes more than they first appear. Model and journalist Sydney Lima immerses herself in the murky world of image modelling, built on grey areas and blurred lines, in a bid to uncover what happens to those who find themselves caught in its grasp.

Presented by: Sydney Lima
Production company: Flying Shoe Films & Meldrum Dent

00:00 Intro
01:00 The rise of image modelling or 'yachting'
03:13 Models speak out
04:58 Agencies exposed
11:12 Illegal under UK law
12:52 Anonymous model speaks out
16:11 The truth about the agencies

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1

episodes.title: Russell Brand: In Plain Sight | Dispatches
episodes.description:
Very strong language, graphic descriptions of sex and allegations of sexual violence that viewers may find distressing.

Dispatches investigates Russell Brand's treatment of women.

First shown: 16 September 2023

episodes.title: Escaping My Dad’s Cult After 30 Years Of Fear | Outsmarting | Channel 4
episodes.description:
Katy escaped her life of fear and paranoia at the age of 30, managing to outsmart the cult in 5 steps, and setting off a chain of events that saw her father Aravindan Balakrishnan jailed for 23 years. 

Now, forensic psychiatrist Dr Sohom Das profiles her father and tries to make sense of his terrifying behaviour, as well as reacting to and dissecting the events that led to Katy’s brave escape.  

00:00 "If we left the house we would die"
01:37 Profile of a cult leader
03:45 Gaslighted by Dad
05:24 How I outsmarted the cult
07:06 Stashing cash to escape
08:54 "I felt vindicated..."

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/Channel4Documentaries?sub_confirmation=1
